Detailed Description

A read-only SquareMatrixAlias class.

Author:
Lee Netherton
The SquareMatrixAliasConstant class provides all the functionality from the MatrixAliasConstant class, but add specific functions intended for square matricies (like inverse(), and determinant()).

Definition at line 1026 of file matrix.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SquareMatrixAliasConstant::SquareMatrixAliasConstant (  const double *  data,
const unsigned int  size
)  [inline]
 

Default constructor.Pointer constructor.

To create a read-only square matrix that will access a pre-available data array.

Parameters:
data Pointer to data array. This will be the data storage for the matrix.
size Number of rows and columns the matrix has.
